meanings.definition: Not able to be obtained or acquired.
meanings.sent1: The rare diamond was unobtainable due to its high price.
meanings.sent2: The secret recipe for the famous cookies was unobtainable.
meanings.sent3: Trying to catch a cloud is as unobtainable as finding a pot of gold at the end of a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of flying without wings felt as unobtainable as touching the stars.
meanings.sent5: The key to the locked chest remained unobtainable, no matter how hard he tried.

meanings.sent1: The mountain peak seemed unobtainable to the weary hikers.
meanings.sent2: Winning the lottery jackpot felt unobtainable to many.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle flaming torches while riding a unicycle would be an unobtainable skill for most people.
meanings.sent4: Her love was like an unobtainable treasure hidden in the depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The championship title remained unobtainable for the underdog team, but they never gave up trying.
